name: I Scream!
description:
This is My first published game and I made it for a Dani's game jam. 

You have to survive as an ice cream for 30 seconds and you can drink milk for eat Squirrels made out of Ice.

BasiC SilLy RaGe GaMe.

Music I used are by this website and it's absolutely free to use.

Music Web : https://www.twisterium.com/creative-commons-music/
